name: Get CURSED On
description:
----IMPORTANT----

There is a second weapon in this game which you can equip by pressing 2, since I wasn't very efficient with my time, I didn't add any indication in the game that you have a second weapon. 

---ABOUT GAME---

Your are redneck stuck in a cursed graveyard.  Cursing and swearing is the only way you know how to fight back, curse at those cursed creatures to get rid off them.

----CONTROLS----

1 - Pistol
2 - Assault Rifle

AWSD - movement
MOUSE - Aim
LEFT MOUSE CLICK - Fire
